page.title: 07MONEY MATTERS IN STEWARTON
page.content:
Three of the main Scottish banks have had branches in Stewarton for many years-The Bank of Scotland,The Clydesdale Bank and The Royal Bank.In recent years offices of building societies have opened -Halifax,Leeds, and Yorkshire.The Post Office provides a useful service in Savings.Many inhabitants use these facilities but some still bank in the place where they work or where they lived before moving to Stewarton.Access,Barclay and Visa cards are also well used. More and more people are now being paid by cheque or direct to their bank accounts. So fewer purchases are made by cash.
e
